body.p: The Wine development release 1.5.16 is now available.

What's new in this release:
New version of the Mono package.
Many improvements to the CMD command-line parser.
More stream classes in the C++ runtime.
Support for managing services in WMI.
Improved CPU detection.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
